Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class Depot

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Depot
Direct Known Subclasses:
SpecialDepot
public class Depot
extends java.lang.Object
Class that represents one of the three depots of the warehouse depots

    Depot​(int size)

    void add​(java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> addedResourceMap)
    This method adds the passed single resource map to the map of the depot

    Checks if a resource map can be added to the depot
    void checkAvailability​(java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> toBeRemovedResourceMap)
    This method removes from toBeRemovedResourceMap the maximum quantity of resources that are both in depot and in the passed map

    Method to check the presence in the depot of the passed resource

    Method used to get the quantity of the resource in the depot

    Getter for the size of the depot

    Adds a resource to the depot, must be called only after performing checks with checkAdd
    void uncheckedRemove​(java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> toBeRemovedResourceMap)
    This method removes from toBeRemovedResourceMap and from the depot the maximum quantity of resources that are both in depot and in the passed map, must be called only after performing checks with checkAvailability

    • Depot

      public Depot​(int size)

  • Method Details

    • getSIZE

      public int getSIZE()
      Getter for the size of the depot
      Returns:
      the amount of resources that can be stored in the depot

    • getMapResource

      public java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> getMapResource()
      Getter for the resource stored in the depot
      Returns:
      a map with the resource stored in the depot

    • setMapResource

      public void setMapResource​(java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> mapResource)

    • checkResource

      public java.lang.Boolean checkResource​(Resource resource)
      Method to check the presence in the depot of the passed resource
      Parameters:
      resource - The resource to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the resource is in the depot, false otherwise

    • checkAdd

      public void checkAdd​(java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> addedResourceMap) throws InvalidAdditionException
      Checks if a resource map can be added to the depot
      Parameters:
      addedResourceMap - The resource map to be added, must be a map with a single key
      Throws:
      InvalidAdditionException - When there is not enough space or there is already another resource in the depot

    • uncheckedAdd

      public void uncheckedAdd​(java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> addedResourceMap)
      Adds a resource to the depot, must be called only after performing checks with checkAdd
      Parameters:
      addedResourceMap - resource map to add, must contain a single key

    • add

      public void add​(java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> addedResourceMap) throws InvalidAdditionException
      This method adds the passed single resource map to the map of the depot
      Parameters:
      addedResourceMap - The single resource map to be added, must be a map with a single key
      Throws:
      InvalidAdditionException - When there is not enough space or there is already another resource in the depot

    • checkAvailability

      public void checkAvailability​(java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> toBeRemovedResourceMap)
      This method removes from toBeRemovedResourceMap the maximum quantity of resources that are both in depot and in the passed map
      Parameters:
      toBeRemovedResourceMap - This map contains the resources that are not found to be stored in a depot yet

    • uncheckedRemove

      public void uncheckedRemove​(java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> toBeRemovedResourceMap)
      This method removes from toBeRemovedResourceMap and from the depot the maximum quantity of resources that are both in depot and in the passed map, must be called only after performing checks with checkAvailability
      Parameters:
      toBeRemovedResourceMap - This map contains the resources that have to be removed from WarehouseDepots

    • getNumberResources

      public int getNumberResources()
      Method used to get the quantity of the resource in the depot
      Returns:
      The quantity of the resource in the depot if there is one, otherwise 0
